      static java.util.Collection<LineSegment2d> getCrackOutlines​(ij.process.ByteProcessor bp)

    • Method Detail

      • getCrackOutlines

        public static java.util.Collection<LineSegment2d> getCrackOutlines​(ij.process.ByteProcessor bp)
        Collects the outlines of all foreground regions in the given image as a collection of line segments ('crack edges'). Note that line segments are not ordered.
        Parameters:
        bp - a binary image (background = 0, foreground > 0)
        Returns:
        an unordered collection of line segments
